raw akas.title: Look What My Sister Dragged In

akas: Look What My Sister Dragged In USA (working title)
akas from release info: Look What My Sister Dragged In USA (working title)

1.title: Something About Fiona/Tickled Pink
1.plot: Coop falls in love with Old Lady Munson's great-great grandniece. / Millie tames Kat by tickling him in a sensitive spot.

2.title: Flea Brains/Menace the Dennis
2.plot: Kat's swarm of flea-sized mind control robots hop into the ears of the people of Bootsville and soon they all destroy Coop. / With Coop out of town, Kat wants to turn water into milk and Dennis comes to the rescue.

3.title: Cheeks of Evil/Reap and Weep
3.plot: Millie brings home the class hamster, unaware that Mr. Kat hates hamsters. / When Kat uses his growth ray to bury Bootsville in a catnip jungle, Coop is blamed by the irate Bootsville Gardening Club.

4.title: Blasteroid Blues/Rat a Phooey
4.plot: Coop tries to stop the destruction of Massive Mart. / Kat builds a Rat-ray gun, which he plans on using to turn Coop into a rat, but Dad gets zapped instead, so Coop hopes he can change Dad back - if he can catch him first.

5.title: Trash Talking/Over the Radar
5.plot: Coop and Dennis climb inside Kat's scratching post and discover Kat's alien technology has created an infinity within. / Coop, Millie, and Dad are taken away to a top secret base to be interrogated, after a UFO investigator suspects they are aliens.

6.title: Nuff Said/Rhymes with Coop
6.plot: Coop decides to let Kat have free rein to cause whatever destruction he wants. / Due to an 'over-loading' problem on the Kat Nebula, Kat plots to turn Bootsville Beach into a giant litter box.

7.title: Bringin' the Heat/The Three Aarghs
7.plot: Kat's devious magnifier satellite is causing a dangerous heat wave in Bootsville. / Coop and Dennis compete with one another to reduce their carbon footprints.

8.title: Kat to the Future: Parts 1 & 2
8.plot: Coop uses Kat's time machine to go back to the past and stop Millie from bringing Kat home, but ends up altering the future for the worse. / Coop tries to undo the Kat invasion, which he brought about by fooling with Kat's time machine.

9.title: Down the Drain/9 to 5 to Oblivion
9.plot: Coop becomes Dennis' wing-man for a change, as they go in search of the 'sewer-croc-baby'. / Coop breaks every window in Dennis' house, and is forced to work off his debt by working in Henry's store.

10.title: When Bad Dogs Go Big/The Botty Guard
10.plot: Growler swallows a Kat device which makes him grow to the size of a T-Rex. / Kat's malfunctioning spybot thinks Coop is its new master, and wants to protect him from Kat.

11.title: Rebel with a Claw/Swap Wrecked
11.plot: The Kat Kommander's rebellious son runs away to Earth, where he becomes a handful for Kat, and a danger to the human race. / Dad accidentally swaps an assortment of Kat's weapons to the unwitting residents of Bootsville.

12.title: Hit the Road/Never Cry Sheep
12.plot: Kat is left at a kennel while the Burtonburgers go on vacation. / Kat becomes obsessed with making the biggest yarn ball ever made, and starts rustling sheep to gather their wool.

13.title: Kickin' Butler/You Kat See Me
13.plot: Dennis is accidentally knocked into a portal around the world. / Kat makes himself invisible and causes trouble for Coop on the night he invites Fiona to dinner and when Dad invites Coop's teacher over for dinner.

14.title: Keep on Rockin'/It's in the Bag
14.plot: Coop's grandparents visit, so Dad buys them rocking chairs. However, it turns out that they are adventure junkies who accept that Kat is an alien. / So he can taunt Kat, Coop searches for the last available bag of the feline's favorite food after the factory that makes it closes down.

15.title: King of the Pipsqueaks/Down the Creek
15.plot: Old Lady Munson's garden gnomes come to life and mistake Coop as their leader. / Old Lady Munson tells Millie creative stories about her adventures in the past.

16.title: Turn the Other Cheeks/Birthday Bashed
16.plot: The evil alien hamster Mr. Cheeks comes back to get revenge on his nemesis, Kat. / Coop's birthday is here, and everyone is coming to his party, and Phoebe is trying to get rid of Fiona so she can have Coop to herself. Meanwhile, Kat is trying to enjoy a virtual picnic in a secluded spot with his girlfriend, but the kids and Coop keep crashing Coop's birthday.

17.title: Mind Games/Strange Kat on a Train
17.plot: Dad orders Coop to spend more quality time with his little sister; Kat builds a telepathy helmet. / Coop goes on a train to buy something from a man named Old Herman, Unfortunately it turns out to be the evil alien hamster, Mr. Cheeks.

18.title: Board Kat/The Treasure of Sierra Munson
18.plot: Coop and Kat fight over the animal's new lightning box generator and end up swapping brains. / Coop discovers buried treasure under Old Lady Munson's house.

19.title: Fangs for the Memories/Drive-In Me Crazy
19.plot: Kat's memory eraser leads to Coop forgetting Kat is an evil alien, but Dad accidentally gets Coop's lost memories and suddenly knows the terrible truth. / Kat builds a device that brings an assortment of movie monsters to life.

20.title: Hair Brains/Hot Dog Day
20.plot: Kat coughs up a trio of living hairballs, which he orders them to attack Coop. / It's Hot Dog Day, and Coop has the honor of being named Keeper of the Weiner Water. But Kat wants to ruin the most special day of the year.

21.title: Amazing Feet of Strength/Me Coop, You Kat
21.plot: Kat upgrades Coop's sneakers to run super fast. / Kat turns Coop into a caveman so he would be to stupid to stop his plots.

22.title: You Scream, I Scream/Good Luck Harm
22.plot: Coop takes on the teen aged bully who pedals the Curly Swirl Ice Cream cart, and forgets to pay attention to Kat's latest evil plans. / Kat makes himself a high-powered good luck charm, which means bad luck for Coop.

23.title: Bootsville's Most Wanted/Kat of Diamonds
23.plot: Buck Diamond, Animal Protection Officer declares Coop "Bootsville's Most Wanted". / Coop and Fiona have to settle their argument before they can work together to stop Kat in his evil tracks.

24.title: Coop D'Etat/The Incredible Shrinking Coop
24.plot: Kat and Old Lady Munson show up at school to torment Coop. / Kat shrinks Coop and Dennis down to size and tries to squash them like bugs, which makes it hard for Coop to do something big for Dad for Father's Day.

25.title: Who's Haunting Who?/It's All in Your Head
25.plot: Kat thinks the haunted LeBoot Mansion will be the perfect place for an inter-space teleporter. / Kat controls the mind of Agent Napolitan, but his plan backfires when some squirrels attack him.

26.title: The Kat Went Back: Parts 1 & 2
26.plot: When Kat is fired for incompetence the Robo-Kat-Kops that are sent to take him home also capture Coop, Dennis, Fiona, Millie, Lorne, and Harley and take them to the Kat Planet. / Coop and the rest of the kids need Kat's help to escape Kat Planet. Will he give it?

1.title: Let the Games Begin/Night of the Zombie Kat
1.plot: Let The Games Begin: When his little sister finds a creepy, hairless, purple cat in the woods, young Coop finds his idyllic world turned upside down./Night of the Zombie Kat: Kat ramps up the horror when Coop stays up late to watch a scary movie. One Kat is bad enough, but can Coop cope with an army of zombie Kats?

2.title: Trespassers Will Be Persecuted/Me-Oh Me-Oh Meow
2.plot: Trespassers: Kat discovers Coop and Dad's biggest fear - getting caught in Old Lady Munson's yard!/Oh Meow: Coop gets Dad to buy Kat a corrective collar to curb his yeowling and destructive behavior but Kat reprograms it to teach Coop a lesson.

3.title: Do Not Fort Sake Me/Cookie D'Uh
3.plot: Fort: Coop and Dennis build the world's greatest Fort complete with anti-Kat defenses. But when Kat sneaks and takes it over, they must run a gauntlet of their own kiddified weapons!/Cookie D'Uh: Millie is determined to outsell Phoebe in this year's Greenie Girl Cookie drive. But a cookie thief is stealing her stock and all evidence points to Coop!

4.title: Nip/Duck/Search and De-toy
4.plot: Nip/Duck: A trip to the vet yields x-rays that prove Kat is no ordinary feline. But Coop must survive long enough to retrieve them! Search and De-toy: Coop's new helicopter is confiscated by Old Lady Munson, prompting Dad to flash back to his childhood run-ins with her. Can Coop retrieve both their precious toys and right a decades old wrong?

5.title: Flu the Coop/Class Act
5.plot: Flu the Coop: Coop is stuck at home with the cold and flu, leaving him at the mercy of Kat until he discovers Kat's extreme alien reaction to cold germs. Class Act: Coop uses magic equipment from the House of Swap to put on a how and disappears Kat for good. But Millie won't let him rest until he finds her precious Mr. Kat again.

6.title: Hypnokat/The Allergy
6.plot: Hypno Kat: Coop hypnotizes with an ugly cat toy. Kat breaks the spell then uses the toy to hypnotize an army of neighborhood cats. And their claws are out for Coop!/The Allergy: Coop tricks Dad into thinking he's allergic to Kat in the hopes he'll send Kat away. But when Kat convinces Dad he's really allergic to Coop may never get close to his father again!

7.title: Just Me and Glue/You'll Be Show Sorry
7.plot: When Coop and Kat get glued hand to paw, they are forced to spend the day together. Kat turns out to be a big help in putting together Coop's new Mechanizor Warrior model robot until Coop realizes Kat has programmed it to destroy Coop, but Kat will also be destroyed. / When a contest for pets is announced in Bootsville, Coop subscribes Kat because the winner wins a trip around the world. However, Coop regrets this when he realizes he will be taking the trip with Kat if he wins.

8.title: How the Test Was Won/I'm Okay You're a Kat
8.plot: Test: Coop stays up late studying for a test despite Kat's interference. But in order to get to the test he must survive Kat's deadly obstacle course./I'm Okay: A self-help tape transforms Coop's attitude and makes him practically impossible for Kat to annoy. But a different side of Coop takes over when Kat re-edits the tape.

9.title: Dial 'B' for Babysitter/The Grass Is Always Meaner
9.plot: Dial B-Coop and Millie must put up with Old Lady Munson as an emergency babysitter. But it's Kat who takes the pain./Grass: Coop tries to make some money gardening for Old Lady Munson, but it's jungle warfare when Kat and Coop battle in the tall grass.

10.title: One Big Happy Family/Happy Campers
10.plot: Family: Coop must stay on his toes to protect the family from Kat when they're accidentally locked inside the Swap Shop/Campers: A simple camping is turned upside for Coop and Dennis when their Dads get competitive. Kat discovers the wilds are a little too wild for him when he manages to annoy and enrage every single creature in the woods.

11.title: U.F. Float/Play N'Ice
11.plot: When Kat soups up the Swap Shop's UFO float for the town parade, Coop thinks he's plotting an attack. / Dad's backyard ice rink and castle become a battleground when t covers the entrance to Kat's secret, underground bunker.

12.title: House of Scream/Planter's Warp
12.plot: Scream: The House of Swap takes a turn for the macabre during Halloween as Kat turns all the lame displays into deadly traps for Coop and his unbelieving friends./Warp: Kat mutates the house plants, causing Dad to think has a super green thumb. But Coop has to do to some serious pruning to do when the plants grow a mind of heir own!

13.title: Curse of Tutankitty's Tomb/Pet Peeved
13.plot: A trip to the museum reveals surprising things about Kat's ancestors. / Coop tricks Kat into running away.

14.title: Don't Give Me No Static/Storm Drained
14.plot: Coop "borrows" one of Kat's weird machines for a school science project with electrifying results. / Coop's little league ball team play the game of their lives when Kat creates a machine that controls the weather.

15.title: Fishy Frisky Business/Teed Off
15.plot: On a family shopping trip, Kat gets Coop banned from the grocery store. / Coop's and Dennis' fathers encourage them to revive a neighborhood tradition, the 'round the block golf challenge.

16.title: Something Fishy in Owl Lake/Dire Education
16.plot: The Burtonburgers face friends, neighbors, and each other in a local Fishing Derby. / Dad comes to school to shadow the kids on Parents' Day.

17.title: Crouching Cooper, Hidden Kat/Tom Kat Foolery
17.plot: Crouching: Dennis shares his uncle's martial arts wisdom (learned from movies) to help Coop defend himself from Kat. Coop battles Kat on the most dangerous sledding hill in town.

18.title: In Dog We Trust/Catch My Drift
18.plot: Seeing how freaked out Kat gets by a huge stray dog, Coop adopts it as his pet and bodyguard, but the dog is a lot more responsibility then he thought, especially after Coop's plan backfires, as Kat retrains it to destroy the house. / Kat overcomes his fear of snow to make sure Coop gets chilly in the Demolition Run tobogganing challenge.

19.title: Suddenly Last Slammer/The Kitty Vanishes
19.plot: Slammer: When the kids on the street are caught by the police causing mayhem, they all have very different ideas about what happened/Vanishes: A cat burglar stalks the neighborhood and Coop is on his tail, er... trail. But can Coop catch a teleporting kitty?

20.title: Capture the Kat/Outer Space Case
20.plot: Kat wants a day off, but Coop and the gang play capture the flag right through to his secret forest oasis. / When Old Lady Munson shows an unusual interest in Coop and Dennis' favorite show, they become equally obsessed with finding out why she likes it.

21.title: Buzz Off!/Fat Kat
21.plot: It's time for the annual Bootsville Days festival celebrating the town's founding. Coop is in a real Battle of the Bugs. / Kat's been eating too many treats and how he is tipping the scales with rolls of flab.

22.title: Kat Whisperer/Bend It Like Burtonburger
22.plot: Coop discovers he has the power to communicate with pets. Or so he thinks. / When Coop shows off his soccer skills he alienates his whole team, including Dennis, leaving him alone to face Kat's robot army.

23.title: Stall That Jazz/Under Destruction
23.plot: When Kat's listening transmitter becomes lodged in his ear, his hearing becomes super sensitive. / After Kat's latest tantrum almost destroys the house, Dad starts his own extreme renovation.

24.title: Beware the Were-Coop/Trick or Threat
24.plot: Were-Coop: When Coop is scratched by Kat under a full moon, Dennis is convinced Coop is transforming in a were-Kat. And Kat is more than happy to help prove it!/Trick or Threat: Halloween takes a turn for the weird when Coop and Dennis must fight off a potential invasion of Kats!

25.title: Hack Kattack/It's a Rocket, Man
25.plot: Kat's attempts to hack into Earth computers are given a leg up by Dennis' new universal remote control and satellite dish. / Coop joins the Bootsville Rocket Club and with a little secret help from Kat, he's soon the star member, but when Coop learns Kat is going to use his rocket to destroy a satellite, the only way Coop can stop him is to destroy his own record breaking flight.

26.title: Kid vs. Kat vs. Christmas: Parts 1 & 2
26.plot: Coop's hopes of a normal Christmas are shattered by the fact that Kat is constantly getting him in trouble; it is revealed that Kat really misses his family back at his home planet. Coop and Millie's grandparents are expected to visit for the Christmas, but many troubles cause them to be late.

imdb.plot outline: When 10-year old Coop Burtonburger's spoiled little sister Millie, brings home a mysterious stray cat, Coop's idyllic life is turned upside down. Coop soon discovers Kat is more than just a scrawny, purple, hairless pet; he is also a super-smart, conniving mastermind, and Kat's also an alien with a fanatical hate for Coop himself. Kat instantly declares war on Coop--to the death; the two fight constantly as Coop tries to stop Kat and tell the world about his possible plans, only to find Kat destroying the evidence and putting the blame on Coop every time.
imdb.title: Kid vs. Kat
plot: When an alien disguised as a cat lands on Earth, Coop Burtonburger's little sister, Millie finds him and brings him home where bedlam ensues.::Anonymous

When 10-year old Coop Burtonburger's spoiled little sister Millie, brings home a mysterious stray cat, Coop's idyllic life is turned upside down. Coop soon discovers Kat is more than just a scrawny, purple, hairless pet; he is also a super-smart, conniving mastermind, and Kat's also an alien with a fanatical hate for Coop himself. Kat instantly declares war on Coop--to the death; the two fight constantly as Coop tries to stop Kat and tell the world about his possible plans, only to find Kat destroying the evidence and putting the blame on Coop every time.::Anonymous
